channel.title: Attacking npc monsters with magic
channel.description: When I try to attack a npc creature, (kbd or other) it says "You can't attack a player's summoned npc" How do I fix it so that I can attack them with magic? [br][size=1]Posted on: March 26, 2007, 02:11:29 PM[/size][hr]plz help

item.title: Attacking npc monsters with magic
item.dc:creator: @number-x number-x
item.description:
@number-x wrote:

[code]if ((EnemyHP2 - hitDiff) < 0) {
hitDiff = EnemyHP2;
}

				mageXP = (hitDiff * 4); 
                                    addSkillXP(mageXP, 6);
				server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].hitDiff = hitDiff;
				server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].Killing[playerId] += hitDiff;
				server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].updateRequired = true;
				server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].hitUpdateRequired = true;

					}
					catch(Exception e) {
                                                    System.out.println("Error at magic on npcs!");
						println_debug(e.toString());
					}
				
				} 
                              }

else {
sendMessage(“You can’t attack a player’s summoned npc!”);
}
break;[/code]

Here the code that doing it im not suree howt to modfy it though i tryed everthign i can gthink up
[br][size=1]Posted on: March 27, 2007, 08:54:34 PM[/size][hr]Can somone please help me!!!
